page.title: 16Royal Doulton Pottery/Norton
page.content: Royal Doulton Pottery, situated in Leek Rd., is the largest individual producer of English Bone China. The Royal Albert "Old English Rose" pattern is the most popular design ever used on bone china, with 70 million pieces having been sold in over 53 countries around the world. The Leek Rd. factory has a total workforce of 600, the majority of whom live within a 3 mile radius. Of the employees, 51.5% are men, and 48.5% are women. 92% are engaged in production, 3%on maintenance,and the administrative staff makes up 5%. More employees are aged under 25 years than any other age band with 180, 161 are aged 26-35, 119 are 36-45, and 140 employees are aged over 45 years.
